analysis.description:
ERC20 (/unique_contracts/0x44f2f79343ac7244c09e0189df05588524a86515.sol#30-35) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_contracts/0x44f2f79343ac7244c09e0189df05588524a86515.sol#30-31)

IOU.withdraw (/unique_contracts/0x44f2f79343ac7244c09e0189df05588524a86515.sol#129-188) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- token.balanceOf(address(this)) == 0 || iou_purchased[msg.sender] > token.balanceOf(address(this))

Reentrancy in IOU.withdraw (/unique_contracts/0x44f2f79343ac7244c09e0189df05588524a86515.sol#129-188):
	External calls:
	- block.number > 4199999 && iou_purchased[msg.sender] > token.balanceOf(address(this)) (/unique_contracts/0x44f2f79343ac7244c09e0189df05588524a86515.sol#145-165)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- iou_purchased (/unique_contracts/0x44f2f79343ac7244c09e0189df05588524a86515.sol#164-165)

Reentrancy in IOU.withdraw (/unique_contracts/0x44f2f79343ac7244c09e0189df05588524a86515.sol#129-188):
	External calls:
	- block.number > 4199999 && iou_purchased[msg.sender] > token.balanceOf(address(this)) (/unique_contracts/0x44f2f79343ac7244c09e0189df05588524a86515.sol#145-165)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- eth_sent (/unique_contracts/0x44f2f79343ac7244c09e0189df05588524a86515.sol#164)
	- total_iou_purchased (/unique_contracts/0x44f2f79343ac7244c09e0189df05588524a86515.sol#156-159)
IOU.seller should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x44f2f79343ac7244c09e0189df05588524a86515.sol#57-60)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_contracts/0x44f2f79343ac7244c09e0189df05588524a86515.sol#68:
	- Usage of "throw" should be replaced with "revert()"
